metadata.description: Enter the worldwide unique name for Data Factory
Enter the Git-Hub Account User Name
Enter the unique Name of the Azure storage account that contains the input/output data.
By Default eastus location is allowed
Enter Email to send the notification.
Enter Teams Connection Name e.g teams-1
Enter Email to send the notification

properties.description: This is linked service which linked the input to the Data Factory.

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	filename as string ('covid_tracking'),
	runid as string ('runtime_guid')
}
source(output(
		date as date,
		county as string,
		state as string,
		fips as integer,
		cases as short,
		deaths as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sourceCSV
sourceCSV derive(Load_Date = currentDate('UTC'),
		Load_Time = currentUTC('yyyy-MM-dd'),
		ISO_Country = 'US',
		Death_Rate = toInteger(divide(deaths, cases)*100)) ~> Add4columns
Add4columns select(mapColumn(
		Load_Date,
		Load_Time,
		Record_Date = date,
		County = county,
		State = state,
		Fips = fips,
		Cases = cases,
		Deaths = deaths,
		ISO_Country,
		Death_Rate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ReformatHeadingAndColumns
ReformatHeadingAndColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concat($filename,'_', $runid,'.parquet'))],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkParquet
ReformatHeadingAndColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concat($filename, '.parquet'))],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkLatestParquet
ReformatHeadingAndColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[(concat($filename,'_', $runid,'.jsonl'))],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkJsonl
ReformatHeadingAndColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[(concat($filename,'_', $runid,'.csv'))],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SinkCSV
ReformatHeadingAndColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[(concat($filename, '.jsonl'))],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkLatestJsonl
ReformatHeadingAndColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[(concat($filename, '.csv'))],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SinkLatestCSV
